description: An alternate trailhead start to reach Quarry Rock at a light pace. This is a new section of trail. The old section of the Baden Powell trail used to direct onto the road.
directions: Head east on Mt Seymour Pkwy W toward Plymouth Dr. Turn left onto Mt Seymour Rd 600 m Turn right onto Indian River Dr700 m Turn left onto Indian River Crescent.900 m Indian River Crescent turns slightly left and becomes Indian River Dr. Baden Powell Trail Marked on Right hand side, watch for stairs.
title: Baden Powell - Indian River Drive to Quarry Rock
